text:
Nov 12
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the layout for scheduling within the Availability tab on the User Details page. Shared on GitHub: pull request #9076.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha on the low-fidelity wireframe for the sign-in flow.
‚Ä¢ Reviewed and shared feedback on the Patient Profile Immunisation tab layout design shared by Vivek.
‚Ä¢ Continued refining typography variables in the design system.
Next
‚Ä¢ Sync with Bodhi on priority design requirements based on the roadmap.
‚Ä¢ Review EMR Implementation Docs and create a design to-do list.
‚Ä¢ Continue updates to the design system.

November 13 & 14
Was mostly off-screen due to being unwell.
‚Ä¢ Made progress on design system tokens for typography, spacing, grid, and layout.
November 15
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Vivek to discuss UI libraries, Shadcn, and shared links for following the Shadcn style guide until the Care design style guide is complete.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the Shadcn design guideline and sign-in flow with Anagha, shared feedback.
‚Ä¢ Read the Lab Management Module documentation and began work on its wireframe.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Aravind and updated the GDC landing page.
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue work on wireframe design for the Lab Management Module UI.
‚Ä¢ Sync with Khavin Shankar on the Lab Management Module design.

November 18
‚Ä¢ Discussed the Lab module in a call with Khavin.
‚Ä¢ Participated in the Care team weekly call.
‚Ä¢ Had a long call with Bodhi about the design system and Lab module.
‚Ä¢ Began working on the Lab module UI wireframe.
‚Ä¢ Shared feedback to Anagha and Vivek on their work for the Login flow and patient profile pages.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Aravind on suggested changes to the GDC landing page and updated them.
November 19
‚Ä¢ Continued design on the Lab module UI wireframe, facing several unsuccessful attempts. Read the Lab Management Module documentation and Khavin‚Äôs notes to clarify the workflow.
‚Ä¢ Reviewed User pages shared by Jacob Jeevan, Shared feedback, and shared sample designs.
Next
‚Ä¢ Finalise and share the first version of the Lab module UI.

Nov 20
‚Ä¢ Updated the GDC website.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha to discuss the sign-in flow and explore UI libraries for reference.
‚Ä¢ Discussed changes to the Lab module flow with Khavin.
Nov 21
‚Ä¢ Revised the Lab module UI draft.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek to review the Doctor Notes UI.
Nov 22
‚Ä¢ Worked on the Lab module UI draft. Figma link
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Bodhi and Gigin to discuss the Lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Khavin on design progress for the Lab module.
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue rethinking the Lab module flow and iterate on the UI based on feedback (WIP). Figma Link.

Nov 25
‚Ä¢ Reworked on the Lab Module UI after identifying that collected samples can only be tracked using a barcode scan or barcode number. Updated the Lab Technician‚Äôs UI flow accordingly.
‚Ä¢ Had a brief discussion with Bodhi and Gigin about the Lab Module progress during a quick call.
‚Ä¢ Reviewed Vivek‚Äôs designs for the new Shift Patient and Patient Notes pages and provided detailed feedback.
Next
‚Ä¢ Finalise the Lab Module UI draft and share the updated version.

Nov 26
‚Ä¢ Continued work on the lab module UI draft
‚Ä¢ Had a discussion with Vivek regarding the patient shifting UI.
‚Ä¢ Shared the new task link to Anagha.
Next
‚Ä¢ Sync with Bodhi regarding the lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Update the test process and results pages for the lab module.

Nov 27
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi and Gigin regarding the lab module and decided to add a text area for notes, which can be used for storage details entry.
‚Ä¢ Updated the receive specimen page for the lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha regarding the task related to sidebar icons.
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Vivek regarding the patient shifting page layout.
‚Ä¢ Participated in DPG review call.
‚Ä¢ Had couple of calls with Yashwanth regarding the filter, search, and table layout and UX for the lab module front end.
Nov 28
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha on icon design for the sidebar and sign-in flow, including verification OTP input.
‚Ä¢ Assigned Vivek a new task to redesign the Facility settings page.
‚Ä¢ Updated the lab module specimen process UI.
‚Ä¢ Discussed filter UX for the lab module with Yashwanth.
Next
‚Ä¢ Complete the lab module review and report generation UI.

Nov 29
‚Ä¢ Worked on the lab module process page UI. Explored lab process videos to understand the complete workflow and updated the UI based on insights, particularly regarding aliquot creation and barcode assignment.
‚Ä¢ Multiple calls with Yashwanth regarding the Lab module UI and filter UX.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek on the Facility settings page UI.
Over the weekend
‚Ä¢ Created multiple iterations of the lab module, spending time understanding the lab process flow and revising several screens. Figma link
Next
‚Ä¢ Review the patient profile tab pages designed by Vivek.
‚Ä¢ Sync with Bodhi on the Lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Complete the UI for pathologist/doctors review of Lab results.

Dec 2
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi on the Lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Refined the specimen collection UI for Lab module.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha regarding design systems and sign-in flow.
‚Ä¢ Participated in Care core weekly review.
Dec 3
‚Ä¢ Synced with Yashwanth on the updated flow for lab UI.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek on layout for facility settings page.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha regarding the design system documentation.
‚Ä¢ Continued work on the lab module UI. Figma file Link
Next
‚Ä¢ Review the patient profile tab pages designed by Vivek.
‚Ä¢ Update the UI for pathologist/doctors review of Lab results.
‚Ä¢

Dec 4
‚Ä¢ Reviewed the patient profile tab pages designed by Vivek.
‚Ä¢ Updated the Lab module UI to handle single test orders.
Dec 5
‚Ä¢ Shared feedback on button components for design system work by Anagha.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi and Vignesh regarding the encounter form builder and encounter page UI.
‚Ä¢ Worked on form layout for the form builder https://form-grid.vercel.app/
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek regarding the patient tab pages.
Next
‚Ä¢ Review Vivek‚Äôs work on patient details page.
‚Ä¢ Review Anagha‚Äôs work on design system components.
‚Ä¢ Continue work on the patient encounter page UI.

Dec 6
‚Ä¢ Synced with Yashwanth to discuss Lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha on Button component designs.
‚Ä¢ Continued work on the lab module UI.
Dec 9
‚Ä¢ Had multiple discussions with Yashwanth about the Lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Participated in Care core weekly meeting.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek about updated UI for immunisation, patient shifting, and notes pages.
‚Ä¢ Updated the lab UI for doctors‚Äô test request form based on discussions with Yashwanth.
Dec 10
‚Ä¢ Discussed UI for PRN and titrated prescriptions with Rithvik.
‚Ä¢ Addressed Khavin‚Äôs feedback on Lab UI for specimen testing and partial report generation.
‚Ä¢ Reviewed button component design with Anagha.
‚Ä¢ Experimented with button component and property settings.
‚Ä¢ Reviewed Vivek‚Äôs updates to patient profile pages.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi to discuss patient appointment booking flow and form builder‚Äôs horizontal scroll issue.
Next
‚Ä¢ Redesign the table layout form structure to eliminate horizontal scrolling.
‚Ä¢ Start work on the patient appointment form for palliative care.

Dec 11
‚Ä¢ Explored different layouts to eliminate horizontal scrolling in table forms.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the button component with Anagha.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the patient profile tab pages with Vivek.
Dec 12
‚Ä¢ Started work on the Care public page design.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the patient profile page layout and medication table layout with Bodhi.
Dec 13
Slow day due to travel.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi to update the Care public page design.
Dec 14
‚Ä¢ Updated the UX flow for the Care public page.
Next
‚Ä¢ Redesign the layout for the patient profile and encounter view.

Dec 16
Slow day due to travel.
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the secondary sidebar layout for the patient profile page. Figma Link
Dec 17
‚Ä¢ Designed the patient appointments page post-patient login. Figma Link
‚Ä¢ Reviewed and shared feedback on design system components created by Anagha.
Dec 18
‚Ä¢ Explored UX improvements for the encounter form builder.
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Vivek to discuss UI changes for the facility settings pages.
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue work on the encounter form builder and patient overview page.
‚Ä¢ Review TOTP flow designs from Anagha.

Dec 30
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the Search Component UI (Slack Thread).
‚Ä¢ Worked on the Patient Details Page header layout and badges (Slack Thread, GitHub PR).
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek on the Patient Details Page CTA Buttons UI and Patient Notes Page UI.
Dec 31
‚Ä¢ Synced with Anagha regarding Design System Components.
‚Ä¢ Added Icons to the design system.
‚Ä¢ Continued work on the Patient Details Page Layout and Encounter Form.
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue work on the Patient Overview and Encounter Form.

Jan 2
‚Ä¢ Continued work on the patient encounter questionnaire.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek regarding the redesign of the notes page.
Jan 3
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi to discuss the questionnaire design.
‚Ä¢ Reworked the medicine prescription layout within the questionnaire.
Jan 6
‚Ä¢ Updated the questionnaire and shared it on the design channel.
‚Ä¢ Responded to a query on the thread regarding the password reset UI.
Next
‚Ä¢ Work on the design for the Public Facilities page: PR #9748.
‚Ä¢ Continue working on the Patient Overview page design.

Jan 7
‚Ä¢ Designed the filter dropdown for the Public Facilities page. Slack link
‚Ä¢ Updated the UI for password verification. Slack link
‚Ä¢ Synced with Amjith to discuss the questionnaire form layout and medication request design.
Jan 8
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the layout for the medication request questionnaire.
Jan 9
‚Ä¢ Multiple calls with Amjith regarding the medication request UI and its mobile view.
‚Ä¢ Reviewed the PR for the medication request and provided feedback.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the Organisation page design with Vivek.
Jan 10
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the UI for password and username validation and discussed it with Aditya.
‚Ä¢ Worked on designing the Encounter overview page.
Next
‚Ä¢ Complete the Encounter overview page, focusing on action button placement and status badge interactions.

Jan 13
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the Encounter Overview Page layout.
‚Ä¢ Participated in the Weekly Review Meeting.
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Anagha to discuss the Encounter List Page Header UI.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the design for the Org Departments Page with Vivek.
Jan 14
‚Ä¢ Synced with Amjith to update the Medication Request UI.
‚Ä¢ Refined the Encounter Overview Page design.
Jan 15
‚Ä¢ Designed the Prescription Print Preview Page.
‚Ä¢ Started work on the Medication Administration UI.
Jan 16
‚Ä¢ Shared a draft version of the Medication Administration UI.

Jan 17
‚Ä¢ Updated the Medication Administration UI based on suggestions from Bodhi.
Next
‚Ä¢ Complete the pending modal screens for the Edit Prescription Page.
‚Ä¢ Improve the Patient Login UX.

Missed EODs from Last Week
‚Ä¢ Worked on the mobile view for the Medicine Administration UI.
‚Ä¢ Had calls with Anagha and Vivek to review their work and shared feedback.
‚Ä¢ Discussed various UI screens with Bodhi, including the Facility Page, Mobile UI, and Patient Login Flow.
Was on sick leave on the 27th and 28th.
Jan 28
‚Ä¢ Attempted to update the sidebar navigation.
‚Ä¢ Had a short call with Amjith regarding the Medicine Administration UI and its mobile view.
Jan 29
‚Ä¢ Worked on Facility Page Settings, implementing an independent navigation bar.

Feb 3
‚Ä¢ Updated the Location Settings page.
‚Ä¢ Participated in the weekly review meeting.
‚Ä¢ Updated the Facility General page, including the cover, address, and location sections.
Feb 4
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Amjith and Bodhi regarding the treatment summary page.
‚Ä¢ Worked on the Questionnaire Settings page.
‚Ä¢ Tried designing a logo for Care for Animals using the placeholder name Care Janvar. Ended up with just a paw-print, but it is missing an animal. Logo needs elephantification.
Feb 5
‚Ä¢ Iterated on the Questionnaire Edit and Preview pages. The previous version had extra pages for previewing the existing questionnaire and separate pages for editing. I reworked the design so it now includes only Edit and Preview pages.
‚Ä¢ Attended the Pupilfirst Open House.
Feb 6
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Vivek and shared my thoughts on his design suggestions for the Appointments Flow UX.
‚Ä¢ Updated the Questionnaire Edit page. redesigned the layout with a navigation panel, form, and properties section.üëâ Figma Link
Next
‚Ä¢ Update the mobile view for the Departments and Locations pages.
‚Ä¢ Add the Questionnaire Create page and implement mobile views for the questionnaire pages.

Feb 10
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Bodhi and Vignesh regarding the UX for the Service Request page and changes in the Lab module UI.
‚Ä¢ Discussed the questionnaire edit and preview form for the Facility Settings pages with Bodhi.
‚Ä¢ Started working on the UI for the Service Request page.
‚Ä¢ Participated in the engineering review meeting.
Feb 11
‚Ä¢ Continued working on the UI for the Service Request page.

‚Ä¢ Participated in the DPG weekly review call.
‚Ä¢ Had a call with Bodhi to get clarity on Lab module UI changes.

‚Ä¢ Update the UX for the Lab module UI.

Feb 13
‚Ä¢ Continued working on the service request UI.
Feb 14
‚Ä¢ Worked on another iteration of the service request UI.

Weekend
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the Care Janwar logo.

Feb 17

Feb 18

‚Ä¢ Made more updates to the service request UI.
Feb 19
‚Ä¢ Gave feedback on the updated location UI.
‚Ä¢ Read FHIR docs to understand specimen processing better and redesigned the lab module UI. Figma link
Next
‚Ä¢ Update the lab test result print preview and get feedback on the updated UI for service requests and lab module UI.

Feb 20
‚Ä¢ Updated the aliquoting and test result entry UI in the lab test module.
Feb 21
‚Ä¢ Synced with Bodhi regarding the location-based search UI, service request user flow, and lab module UI progress.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Don and shared an updated medicine administration UI change, which now accommodates both start and end time status cards.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek regarding the location-based patient encounter search UI. Suggested changes based on feedback from Bodhi.
‚Ä¢ Updated the service request UI and redesigned the lab module‚Äôs specimen handling UI. The changes align with service requests instead of specimens, as a single specimen can be used for multiple service requests. Figma link
‚Ä¢ Shared Care sub-solutions logos with Bodhi.
Next
‚Ä¢ Find a design solution for the styling inconsistencies in facility feature badges highlighted by Aditya.
‚Ä¢ Revisit the service request user flow and address missing pieces, such as invoice printing and the review page for lab test results.

Feb 24
‚Ä¢ Shared the designed badges and categorised facility features based on the available colors in our design system. Slack Thread
‚Ä¢ Updated the service request UI flow to handle individual service requests.
‚Ä¢ Synced with Vivek on the encounter search UX based on location.
Feb 25
‚Ä¢ I was looking to fix some styling in the questionnaire form, on sticky properties, navigation sections, and a lower-contrast switch UI. Ended up resolving a scroll issue in the layout container. GitHub Issue
‚Ä¢ Reviewed a UX issue highlighted in the engineering channel and explored ways to improve the flow. Slack Thread
Next
‚Ä¢ Review Vivek‚Äôs encounter locations UI designs.
‚Ä¢ Update the result review UI for the lab module.

Feb 26
‚Ä¢ Designed badges and categorised facility features.
‚Ä¢ Improved the service request and lab module UI.
Feb 27

‚Ä¢ Had a call with Bodhi to discuss the Pharmacy module, user stories for nurses, encounter location UI, and more.
Feb 28
‚Ä¢ Worked on redesigning the user onboarding and facility selection flow. Figma Link
Weekend
‚Ä¢ Updated the GDC landing page, certificate designs, and a poster.
Next
‚Ä¢ Start work on the Pharmacy module UI.

Missed EODs Last Week :/
‚Ä¢ Synced with Amjith regarding the patient location assignment UI.
‚Ä¢ Designed a draft for the location assignment UI and got feedback from Bodhi and Amjith.

March 10

‚Ä¢ Had a look at UX issues in the questionnaire forms, particularly on small screens.
March 11
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the questionnaire page flow for better UX. Discussed with Bodhi the increased clicks and learning curve for users. Figma Prototype

‚Ä¢ Had a call with Dr. Athul regarding the questionnaire UI and the need to simplify the UX, especially for the community nursing questionnaire.
Next
‚Ä¢ Improve the questionnaire UI by reducing clutter and making action buttons more prominent.
‚Ä¢ Continue exploring the requirements and user flow for the Pharmacy module.

‚Ä¢ Added a few issues to the Notion task list.
Next
‚Ä¢ Review PR: #11367.
‚Ä¢ Continue work on the Pharmacy module. Progress was delayed due to multiple other UI-related tasks.
